customModules.title: AI Card Studio – Interactive Prompt & Workflow Automation Platform | Founder & Full-Stack Developer
content: Developed a web platform to solve the fragmentation of prompt usage, enabling users to centralize, design, and render AI-powered flashcards with real-time preview and structured outputs.

Engineered a workflow automation layer with webhook support, making the system interoperable with mainstream agent platforms such as n8n and extensible to multi-LLM backends (DeepSeek, OpenAI, Gemini).
Implemented a theme-driven, responsive UI with Tailwind and Radix UI, enhancing usability and increasing retention by simplifying the creation-to-deployment pipeline.
Established CI/CD and database integration (Supabase + Notion API), enabling scalable storage, seamless data sync, and reliable production deployment via GitHub Actions and Vercel.

customModules.title: JD2CV – Automated Resume Customization Engine | Creator & Full-Stack Developer
content: Designed and launched a system to automate CV tailoring to job descriptions, addressing the pain point of manual keyword alignment and improving ATS pass rates for applicants.
Built workflow automation pipelines leveraging LangChain and DeepSeek to extract JD keywords, match against a structured resume module vault, and generate role-specific CV outputs.
Integrated with Supabase for vector search and embedding storage, enabling semantic matching of experiences, skills, and JD requirements in real time.
Delivered a production-ready Next.js front end with dynamic resume composer and deployed via Vercel, reducing CV customization time from hours to minutes.

customModules.title: Selected Projects | Founder & Full-Stack Developer
content: Readlingua – A multilingual reading platform supporting 40+ languages, featuring automated vocabulary extraction, hover translation, and adaptive review workflows to enhance language acquisition.
IELTS Speaking Engine – An AI-powered practice tool that dispatches IELTS questions, generates Band 6–8 sample answers, and provides highlight-word explanations for targeted speaking improvement.
Feelink – A social sharing platform that transforms user-generated quotes and sentiments into interactive, animated displays with real-time rendering and responsive design.
